start_message:
🤖 Hello! I'm AleshaBot, your assistant for broadcasting RSS feeds to Telegram channels.

Use the menu below to manage feeds, channels, and subscriptions.
start_message_unauthorized: 🚫 Access denied. Please contact the bot administrator.
error_occurred: ⚠️ An error occurred. Please try again or contact the administrator.
item_action_select: 👇 Select an action for the item:
add_feed_prompt_name: 📝 Enter a name for this feed (optional, type /skip to skip):
add_feed_invalid_url: ❌ Invalid URL or feed not accessible. Please try again.
add_feed_already_exists: ℹ️ Feed with URL {feed_url} already exists.
list_feeds_empty: 📭 The feed list is empty. Add a feed using the '➕ Add Feed' button.
set_feed_delay_prompt: ⏱️ Enter the new publishing delay (in minutes) for feed '{feed_name}':
set_feed_delay_invalid: ❌ Please enter an integer number of minutes.
set_feed_delay_success: ✅ Delay for feed '{feed_name}' set to {delay} minutes.
delete_feed_confirm_prompt: ❓ Are you sure you want to delete the feed '{feed_name}' ({feed_url})? This will also delete all associated subscriptions.
delete_feed_success: 🗑️ Feed '{feed_name}' and all its subscriptions have been deleted.
add_channel_select_chat_prompt:
👇 Press the button below to select a channel or group where the bot will send messages.

⚠️ Make sure you are an administrator in the selected chat and have granted the bot permission to post messages.
add_channel_bot_not_admin: 🚫 The bot is not an administrator in chat '{chat_title}' or lacks permission to post messages. Please add the bot as an administrator with the necessary rights and try again.
add_channel_bot_not_member: 🚫 The bot is not a member of the chat with ID {chat_id}. Please add the bot to this chat manually (as an administrator with permission to post messages), then add it here.
add_channel_link_prompt: 🔗 Enter the username (@username), link (t.me/...), or ID (-100...) of the public channel or group:
add_channel_link_empty: ❌ You did not enter an identifier. Please try again.
add_channel_link_invalid_format: ❌ Invalid format. Please enter a username (@username), link (t.me/...), or ID (-100...).
add_channel_link_not_found: ❓ Could not find the channel/group by identifier '{identifier}'. Check the input or ensure the chat is public.
add_channel_link_success:
✅ Channel/Group '{chat_title}' (ID: {chat_id}) added successfully.

⚠️ Make sure the bot is added to this chat as an administrator with permission to post messages!
add_channel_link_already_exists:
ℹ️ Channel/Group '{chat_title}' (ID: {chat_id}) already exists in the list.

⚠️ Make sure the bot is added to this chat as an administrator with permission to post messages!
delete_channel_confirm_prompt: ❓ Are you sure you want to delete the channel/group '{channel_name}' (ID: {chat_id})? This will also delete all associated subscriptions.
subscribe_select_feed_prompt: 📰 Select the RSS/Atom feed to subscribe channel '{channel_name}' to:
subscribe_enter_hashtags_prompt: ✏️ Enter hashtags for this subscription (space-separated, e.g., #news #important). Type /skip to skip.
subscribe_success: ✅ Channel '{channel_name}' successfully subscribed to feed '{feed_name}' with hashtags: {hashtags}
subscribe_success_no_hashtags: ✅ Channel '{channel_name}' successfully subscribed to feed '{feed_name}' without hashtags.
subscribe_already_exists: ℹ️ Channel '{channel_name}' is already subscribed to feed '{feed_name}'.
unsubscribe_select_feed_prompt: 📰 Select the feed to unsubscribe channel '{channel_name}' from:
unsubscribe_not_found: ❓ Subscription of channel '{channel_name}' to feed '{feed_name}' not found.
list_subs_select_channel_prompt: 📢 Select the channel/group to view subscriptions for:
list_subs_error: ❌ Failed to load subscription list for channel '{channel_name}'.
edit_hashtags_select_channel_prompt: 📢 Select the channel/group to edit subscription hashtags for:
edit_hashtags_select_feed_prompt: 📰 Select the subscription to edit hashtags for in channel '{channel_name}':
edit_hashtags_enter_new_prompt:
✏️ Current hashtags: `{current_hashtags}`

Enter new hashtags (space-separated) or /skip to remove all hashtags:
edit_hashtags_success: ✅ Hashtags for the subscription of channel '{channel_name}' to feed '{feed_name}' updated: {hashtags}
edit_hashtags_success_removed: ✅ Hashtags for the subscription of channel '{channel_name}' to feed '{feed_name}' removed.
force_check_started: 🔄 Starting forced check of all feeds...
force_check_finished: ✅ Forced check completed. New entries found: {new_entries_count}.
scheduler_send_error: ❌ Error sending entry from feed {feed_url} to channel {channel_id}: {error}
